title: Is it Perma-Bannable to AFK
body: I just got back from 2-week ban (yea I know I was wrong) and my internet isn't that stable. Sometimes I have the tendency to lag like crazy, causing me to disconnect. If I do AFK, is this perma-bannable? Or does a perma-ban only count towards behavioral problems? Am kinda worried since I might have to leave occasionally (the game just doesn't load sometimes). Also, if I can't connect at the start of a game and it results in a remake, will I be perma-banned? Thanks for the help.

replies.body: The short answer is no. The longer answer is if you're doing it all the time in ranked you can get a full punishment for it, but generally speaking you will only rack up longer Leaver Busters (kinda like a queue dodge timer) starting at 5 minutes for 5 games and going up to 20 mins for 5 games.

Don't play League.

Sounds hard, but your unstable connection is causing 4 other people to potentially lose because of it.
